verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
See the laughing army
Dancing in the streets.
Signing out the battle cry
With a tambourine.
For the time has now arrived
To possess our land
And proclaim to all the world,
His kingdom is at hand. For...
Chorus:
We shall never be the same again.
The army of God has taken over the land.
The kings of this world are now the kings of our God.
They rule and reign forever.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Se the laughing army
Sounding out the call.
For the sons to rally
to see the final fall,
Of the great whore Babylon,
And her earthly kings
That will never rise again
The laughing army sings. That...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
See the laughing army
Sweeping through the earth
As the nation Israel
Quickly comes to birth.
Fighting as His warriors
Ten thousand prophets strong,
With the weapons of their God
A lauging army song. That...
